tidbits.title: Historical Castles
tidbits.description: Slovakia is home to numerous historical castles, including Spi≈° Castle, one of the largest castle complexes in Central Europe, recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

tidbits.title: Tatra Mountains
tidbits.description: The country boasts the stunning Tatra Mountains, offering outdoor enthusiasts hiking, skiing, and breathtaking alpine scenery in places like High Tatras National Park.

tidbits.title: Rich Folk Traditions
tidbits.description: Slovakia's folk traditions, music, dance, and crafts are an integral part of its culture, celebrated during various festivals and events throughout the year.
